Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: Introduced with FAB-5871 when collection config was added.

Action.author: vdods
Action.body: This was fixed in 1.3 but not in 1.2 (which is the version it was reported for). Can you apply the fix to the release-1.2 branch as well? Thank you!

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: ~denyeart The last update on this was in October. Do you still desire a backport to 1.2?

Action.author: vdods
Action.body: Ideally yes, but honestly I stopped attempting to use `peer chaincode list --instantiated` altogether. So I'm content with an upgrade to 1.3 whenever that makes sense for me. Thanks!
